title: It's in the Game: Madden NFL
description: It's one of the biggest video games of all time, a groundbreaking brand that became a worldwide phenomenon, spanning generations—but it almost never happened… Now, 36 years after the first game's release, EA SPORTS gives viewers unprecedented access to the makers of game that changed the game, and our culture too.

episodes.title: Can a Computer Make You Cry?
Everything's Fine and We're Shipping on Time
We are Definitely in the Fourth Quarter
